TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UninstallAction extends System.Enum

summary.span: Especifica o que um instalador deve fazer durante uma desinstalação.

span.span: Specifies what an installer should do during an uninstallation.

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo a seguir cria um desinstalador personalizado que herda de classe.The following sample creates a custom uninstaller that inherits the class. Em substituído função, o enumeração é definida com base na entrada do usuário.In the overridden function, the enumeration is set based on user input. Se a entrada é "n", o desinstalador personalizado não terão nenhuma ação do recurso no log de eventos inserido pelo usuário.If the input is "n", the custom uninstaller will not take any action on the resource in the event log entered by the user. Caso contrário, ele removerá o recurso do log de eventos.Otherwise, it will remove the resource from the event log. [!code-cpp[UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3/CPP/uninstallaction_noaction_remove_3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3/CS/uninstallaction_noaction_remove_3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/UninstallAction_NoAction_Remove_3/VB/uninstallaction_noaction_remove_3.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction NoAction = int32(1)

summary.span: Deixa o recurso criado pelo instalador como está.

span.span: Leaves the resource created by the installer as is.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction Remove = int32(0)

summary.span: Remove o recurso criado pelo instalador.

span.span: Removes the resource the installer created.
